name: Fruit Fall (itch) (General Jorge)
description:
Cats have taken over using box forts! Use your slingshot to launch fruit and topple their fragile buildings!

Controls

Click and drag fruit to launch. While dragging, use mouse scroll wheel to increase/decrease height of trajectory.

WASD to move camera

SPACE to activate powers after launching fruit. 

Powers

Orange - None

Lemon - Speed boost

Banana - Split

Watermelon - Explode (Also explodes a few seconds after impact)
